question: Which pair of the following cells in the embryo sac are destined to change their ploidy after fertilization?
explanation: The Egg cell (n) becomes the Zygote (2n).
The Central cell (2n) becomes the Primary Endosperm Nucleus (3n).
Antipodals and Synergids degenerate, they do not change ploidy to form permanent structures in the same way.
